participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, she enjoys learning about different cultures.
participant_1.background: i'm 60years old. i've visited spain a times. i am a librarian. i think i will retire in a few years. i really like to travel.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and disciplined, he finds purpose in helping others.
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month. i'm ex military. i work fulltime in a shipyard.
